docs.snippet: PARIS, March 7, (Associated Press.)-- The Foreign Office today found it necessary to issue a statement explanatory of the conditions under which the South American countries and Portugal yesterday obtained all five places allotted to the smaller...
docs.lead_paragraph: PARIS, March 7, (Associated Press.)-- The Foreign Office today found it necessary to issue a statement explanatory of the conditions under which the South American countries and Portugal yesterday obtained all five places allotted to the smaller powers on the important Financial Commission and three out of five places on the Economic Commission.
docs.abstract: smaller European nations almost shut out of economic and financial comm when South Americans and Portuguese obtain all 5 places allotted to small nations

headline.main: SOUTH AMERICANS SEIZE BULK OF PLACES; Smaller European Nations Almost Shut Out of Economic and Financial Commissions.

docs.snippet: Governor Coolidge now said:  "The next to address you is the President of Harvard University, an educator renowned throughout the world, a profound student of Government and the science of statesmanship, truly a master of arts, eminently a doctor of...
docs.lead_paragraph: Governor Coolidge now said: "The next to address you is the President of Harvard University, an educator renowned throughout the world, a profound student of Government and the science of statesmanship, truly a master of arts, eminently a doctor of laws, fitted to represent the Massachusetts domain of letters--Abbott Lawrence Lowell."

headline.main: Lowell Would Clarify Draft and Forbid Foreign Footholds Here; Dwells Upon the Great Need of Measures to Prevent Future Wars, and Says the Draft, with Certain Alterations, Would Accomplish That Purpose. International Council. No Constructive Criticism. League's Obligations. An Automatic Boycott. Obligations Specified. Question of Mandatories. No Super-State. Lowell's Speech and Lodge's Rejoinder Must Not Be Immobile. As to Monroe Doctrine. Limiting Armaments. Not Perfection, but Needed. Trotzky and Lenine.

docs.snippet: CHICAGO, March 23.--A canvass of the Latin American envoys in Washington by The Chicago Tribune indicates...  that the South and Central American republics are cold to the proposition of incorporating a recognition of the Monroe Doctrine in the...
docs.lead_paragraph: CHICAGO, March 23.--A canvass of the Latin American envoys in Washington by The Chicago Tribune indicates... that the South and Central American republics are cold to the proposition of incorporating a recognition of the Monroe Doctrine in the League of Nations covenant.

headline.main: COLD TO MONROE DOCTRINE.; Latin American Envoys Not Anxious for Its Reaffirmation.

docs.snippet: Following the sailing yesterday of five superdreadnoughts to act as mother ships along the navy's transatlantic flight route and the first air trip of the NC-4, which surpassed expectations, Commander John II. Towers announced the official route the...
docs.lead_paragraph: Following the sailing yesterday of five superdreadnoughts to act as mother ships along the navy's transatlantic flight route and the first air trip of the NC-4, which surpassed expectations, Commander John II. Towers announced the official route the seaplanes will take on the long tourney which may bring to the United States the honor of blazing the air trail to Europe.
